mapper.update: update waf set name = #{name}, ip = #{ip}, port = #{port}, version = #{version}, status = #{status}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into waf (name, ip, port, version, status, description) value (#{name}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{version}, #{status}, #{description})
mapper.select: select id, name, ip, port, version, status, description from waf where id = #{id}
